name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code - Free Fast Small Simple Secure

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free, Fast, Small, Simple, Secure. Generates QR code of current page with click or Ctrl+Shift+1

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometime you need to open current page in Mobile and you have to open QR Code Generator and paste site URL to generate QR Code.

To avoid that, here is Chrome extension to get QR Code Host of the current tab.

Free - Free to use, modify, distribute
Fast - Generating QR Code in few seconds
Small - 10% size of similar extensions
Simple - Click on icon or Ctrl+Shift+1/âŒ˜+Shift+1 in Mac to Generate QR
Secure - Not using any special permission, Not storing any data, Safe to use

Code Inspired by - https://github.com/djadmin/copy-host
QR Code Powered by http://goqr.me/

This is open source project. 
Source is available at https://github.com/tusharv/QRHost
